course_description: This seminar is an interdisciplinary exploration of Sufism or Islamic Mysticism. It gives students in-depth experience interpreting Sufi phenomena, from mystical theories to theological controversies to ritual practices. Materials include classic texts in translation, poetry, and song.
sections: Class Nbr: 2520, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 10a-12:45p, Instructor: S. Kugle, Status: Open
